title: I CANT POST UNTIL LVL 6???
body: i am trying to post on the concept board but its telling me i can't post tell lvl 6 what does that mean and how do i lvl up ?

replies.body: Not hijacking the thread, but I also have the same issue. But thank you sir Targon, I will wait for the reconciliation.

Sometimes Boards and Summoner profiles have a falling out. It seems your discussion post here has reunited them, and they've agreed you're level 30 for reals. You shouldn't see issues posting anywhere on the boards now!

Let me know if you have any questions.
